content.html:
@jasonzliang , could you describe each block in a few words? Nothing too fancy, just a general description for us to have a better idea of what each block means.

For example, in the previous diagram, Agents referred to clients (users) outside of the server, but here you added an agent box inside of GameState and I'm not sure what that means.

I think it would also be nice to capture @caguero 's ASCII art in this diagram.
